credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
title: The Holy Family
medium: Pen and ink, black and white chalk on oatmeal colored paper.
description: Drawing of the Holy Family, at center is Christ as a baby standing while the Virgin Mary is seated to the right supporting him.  Behind them at center left is Joseph standing.  Christ is reaching down to grab an object from the small Sheppard (?).  To the right a man looks over and to the center left a woman seated looks on.  An angel flies above all at upper right corner.
name: Drawing
